title: 1920s Arizona font, can anyone id this?
content:
Can any one identify this font painted on our gym's roof at the University of Arizona as we have lost all record of it. We would very much appreciate it.

| Attachment | Size |
| --- | --- |
| [image.jpg](http://web.archive.org/web/20130818213356/http:/typophile.com/files/image_38.jpg) | 73.84 KB |
author: Studiomogul 02

comments.content:
Hello  
Similar:  
 [http://www.whatfontis.com/Octin-College-Bold-typodermic.font?text=BEAR%2...](http://web.archive.org/web/20130818213356/http:/www.whatfontis.com/Octin-College-Bold-typodermic.font?text=BEAR%20DOWN "http://www.whatfontis.com/Octin-College-Bold-typodermic.font?text=BEAR%20DOWN")  
Alex  
I found it using: [http://www.whatfontis.com](http://web.archive.org/web/20130818213356/http:/www.whatfontis.com/ "http://www.whatfontis.com") - Identify the font you are looking for!

Thank you all so far. Who knew DaFont would have so many similar fonts to the one on our building, however, none of them have the original fonts pleasing proportions and the two arms and the bar of the E are equal on ours.

Huzzah for Ryuk for alerting me to Liberator for it comes the closest.

Some specimen book must have the whole font!
